```{r}
library(Mapper)
```


Example using chemical diabetes data set 

```{r}
library(locfit)
data("chemdiab")
m <- MapperRef$new(X = scale(chemdiab[, 1:5]))$
  use_filter(filter = "KDE")$
  use_cover("fixed interval", number_intervals = 5L, percent_overlap = 50)$
  construct_k_skeleton(k = 1L)
```
